```{python}
import berserk
import pandas as pd

with open('../Lichess_API_token.txt', 'r') as file:
    api_token = file.read().strip()

# Authentication with Personal Token
session = berserk.TokenSession(api_token)
client = berserk.Client(session=session)

l = client.users.get_leaderboard("blitz", count = 200)
df = pd.DataFrame(l)
best_200_players_names = df['username']
all_games = pd.DataFrame()
for names in best_200_players_names:
  games = client.games.export_by_player(names, as_pgn = False, max = 20, rated = True, perf_type = "blitz")
  games = pd.DataFrame(games)
  all_games = pd.concat([all_games, games],axis = 0, ignore_index = True)
pass
```
